title: Masjid where they fixed prayer time, Imam prays in elevated spot, make congregation dhikr Assimalhak
transcript: from nigeria he says that should i pray in a masjid that does the following number one they fix the prayer to a particular time now if the time they had fixed falls within the beginning of the salah time and the end of it so for example starts at 12 30 ends at 3 30 these are three hours if they fix the prayer time to be always at one o'clock this is permissible especially when people need to time their salat due to their work due to their schools due to their other things and they all agree that one o'clock is a convenient time there's no problem in that but if they fix the time before the actual daughter time begins so they fix it at 12 15 when the then is at 12 30 or they fix it at 3 35 which is already assert time you cannot pray there the imam prays on a podium or a little bit elevated from the people the prayer is valid but it is macro and some scholars say that it is haram yet there are uh evidences that the prophet saws led the prayer while offering it on the member and coming down to make sujud and then climbing it up so that the people would see him and learn from him so i don't know what is the reason for this it is highly not recommended to be elevated from the other worshipers of the congregation but the prayer there is still valid insha thirdly they do congregational vicar so after the prayer is over they start to make dhikr in communal in in congregation and this is haram this is an innovation yet the imam is still a muslim and you still can offer the prayer behind him but once they are engaging in such a bidder you stand up and leave and your prayer is valid
